title: [K-12] Customized Intermediate Classical Piano Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental piano performance skills and music notation literacy
context.additional_context: Need for personalized educational design considering individual learners' physical conditions, performance experience, and career goals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to perform intermediate-level classical piano pieces (e.g., Chopin Waltz) with accurate fingering and expressive interpretation in a VR environment.
Learners will be able to accept diverse perspectives on musical interpretation through collaboration with peers and develop creative performance approaches.
Learners will be able to self-assess their skill development progress and create improvement plans through regular formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
